bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with niu pi xuan 牛皮癬 , ox-hide xuan -illness. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry yan jiao 烟膠 quotes Ji de tang jing yan fang 積德堂經驗方 :牛皮血癬：烟膠三錢，寒水石三錢，白礬二錢， 花椒一錢半，為末，臘豬脂調搽 , “For ox-hide blood xuan -illness : yan jiao , 3 qian ; han shui shi , 3 qian ; bai fan , 2 qian ; hua jiao , 1 1/2 qian . Prepare a powder. Mix with cured lard and apply externally”.
